author: sibkatya
content: I am going to delete `beacon_kzg_verification_data_column_single_seconds` from the beacon metrics specs. If I'm not wrong,  `single` kzg is used only in LH, other clients use `batch`. So, no need to add it to the specs. Please, let me know if any other clients use it and want to see it in the specs.

author: sibkatya
content:
Custody groups are ready on Teku, `engine_getBlobsV2` is waiting for clients' implementation [beacon metrics specs PR #14](https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-metrics/pull/14):
```
- beacon_custody_groups (Gauge)
- beacon_custody_groups_backfilled (Gauge)
- beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_requests_total (Counter)
- beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_responses_total (Counter)
- beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_runtime_seconds (Histogram)
```
